name: Sunset Energizer
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour 2 oz of vodka and 3 oz of apple juice over the ice. Top with 1 oz of Red Bull. Stir gently to combine.
backstory: Inspired by the need for a refreshing and energizing drink that captures the essence of a fun-filled evening. The combination of vodka and apple juice provides a sweet base, while the Red Bull infuses a unique zest that keeps the night young.
